Job Posting: 176691 - Position: S26 Test Automation Co-op/Intern (28661) 176691 Co-op Work Term Posted: 2026 - Summer App Deadline Application Method: Posting Goes Live: Job Posting Status: 01/16/2026 09:00 AM Through Employer Website 01/07/2026 02:55 PM Approved ORGANIZATION INFORMATION Organization Country Nokia Canada JOB POSTING INFORMATION Placement Term <b> Job Title <b> Position Type Job Location Country Duration Work Mode Salary Currency Salary Salary Range $ Job Description Canada 2026 - Summer S26 Test Automation Co-op/Intern (28661) 176691 Co-op Position Ottawa, ON Canada 4 months Hybrid CAD 0.0 per hour for 0 Major List $41,184 to $96,356 per year Position: Test Automation Co-op/Intern Number of Position(s): 1 Duration: 4 Months + Date: May 4 - August 26 , 2026 (Summer Term) Location: Hybrid in Ottawa, Canada EDUCATIONAL RECOMMENDATIONS: Currently a candidate for a Master's, Bachelor's degree, or Diploma in Engineering/Computer Science, or a related field with an accredited school in Canada. Your responsibilities As a part of our team, you will: • Development of scripts or applications (XML, REST, JavaScript, Perl) to simulate various management activities and network scenarios. • Development and execution of test plans to validate functional aspects of the product. • Investigation of product defects encountered during test scenarios. • Execution of tests and maintenance of regression and performance test beds, including publishing results and developing additional functionality. Job Requirements Your skills and experience Qualifications: • Strong programming (Java, Perl, XML, JS) and problem-solving skills. • Ability to learn quickly and to work in a fast-paced, innovative environment • Knowledge of software and/or testing methodologies It would be nice if you also had: • Experience using development tools like Git, IDEs, Jira, and Teams • Networking and telecommunications knowledge Linux operating environment, Windows, Virtual Machines • Citizenship Requirement N/A Position Start Date Position End Date May 04, 2026 12:00 AM August 26, 2026 12:00 AM APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Cover Letter Required? Optional Special Application Instructions APPLICATION LINK: https://jobs.nokia.com/en/sites/CX_1/job/28661 Please click the "I intend to apply to this position" button on SCOPE and also submit your application via the employer's website. Applications are accepted on a rolling basis and the posting may be expired at any time by the employer as submissions are received.
